text: Add safe spawn floor and checkpoint-based respawn
Harden side-scroller controls against stale HTML cache
Improve side-scroller UX and automate changelog updates
Add Codex Space Travel demo and recent updates panel
Hide redundant reason tab (Codex tab already shows deferral page)
Restore ChatGPT originals and hide reason tab for supported Codex demos
Add Codex yaruo page and enable Yaruo 5.3 icon
Show deferred page in Codex tab when unsupported
Disable C4.6 icons for demos that were deferred (particles, rpg)
Enable ChatGPT5.3 icons only for supported pages
Add compare reason tab and broaden Codex 5.3 coverage
Add ChatGPT-5.3 Codex fallback page and routing
